subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador had two flat tires and placed 15th in the first stage of the Vuelta de Castilla in Palencia, Spain, his final tuneup for the Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Alberto Contador had two flat tires and placed 15th in the first stage of the Vuelta de Castilla in Palencia, Spain, his final tuneup for the Giro d’Italia.
